oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Peace on earth Christmas card, circa 1945
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front of Japanese-inspired Christmas card issued by the 2nd Marine Division during World War II, collected by American Marine, Melvin C. Dodson. Dodson enlisted in the U.S. Marine Corps in 1940. He reached the rank of Captain and served in the First and Second Marine Divisions during World War II. He was stationed in Pacific theater and saw action in the battle of Saipan and was stationed in Nagasaki. He also served in the Korean War. Forms part of the Veterans History Project. 1 card: col. ; 5.5 x 4 in.
